snippet: Trumaine McBride has played for five teams in six N.F.L. seasons, always battling the idea that at 5 feet 9 inches he can’t defend against the league’s taller receivers.
abstract: New York Giants cornerback Trumaine McBride has played for five teams in six NFL seasons, always battling the idea that at 5 feet 9 inches he can’t defend against the league’s taller receivers; he has held up well throughout team's three-game winning streak.
lead_paragraph: Trumaine McBride has played for five teams in six N.F.L. seasons, always battling the idea that at 5 feet 9 inches he can’t defend against the league’s taller receivers.

headline.main: Giants Cornerback Fighting the Image of Being Too Small
headline.print_headline: Fighting the Image of Being Too Small
